## Result type

An object representing a successful or failed operation of type `T`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type Result<T> = Success<T> | Error;
```
**References:** [Success](./llm-ops.success.md)<!-- -->, [Error](./llm-ops.error_2.md)
